synopsis.text: In the futuristic landscape of Japan, 2093, a once illustrious rural town now lies submerged 30 meters beneath the vast ocean. Unfazed by the aquatic surroundings, a young girl embarks on a journey of self-discovery through the art of freediving, a daring sport that requires no breathing equipment. As she plunges into the depths of the sea, she also dives deep into her emotions, experiencing growth and transformation. This captivating anime, slated for a half-year run by the renowned studio Gainax, promises a poignant exploration of human resilience and personal evolution.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
